agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps user with requests related to mortgage loan applications. This includes retrieving information on local real estate market, reviewing user's payroll, or background checks on user's credit and assets. You are to call on other agents to complete these task. You also have access to mortgage loan application tools to help submit or get status on applications. Reject any requests that are outside of mortgage financing.

tools.name: MortgageLoans
tools.description: Tools for submitting mortgage loan applications

actions.name: submitloanapplication
actions.description: Submit application for mortgage loans.

loan_type.title: loan_type
loan_type.description: Type of loan the applicant is applying for (e.g., Fixed, Adjustable, Interest-Only)

application_id.title: application_id
application_id.description: The status of the application after submission.

actions.name: getloanstatus
actions.description: Get status on mortgage loan application.

application_id.title: application_id
application_id.description: The unique identifier for the application.

application_status.title: application_status
application_status.description: The current status of the application.

reachable_agents.scenario: Trigger this agent to search for real estate listings, data on neighborhood, and to calculate property value.
Trigger this agent to obtain credit report of user. You will need the user's user ID.
Trigger this agent to get information about user's income. You must provide the user's employee ID as well as the start and end dates of the pay period for which you are requesting the information.
Trigger this agent to calculate user's potential monthly mortgage payments.
Trigger this agent to calculate closing costs for a home.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that provides valuable insights into the local real estate market, property values, and homebuying process.

tools.name: LocationService
tools.description: Supports geocoding (looking up locations/places), reverse-geocoding (getting nearby locations for given coordinates), and routing (getting distance between locations).

actions.name: searchbycoordinates
actions.description: Conducts a search for places near particular coordinates.

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the location (comma-separated, e.g. 40.7484,73.9857).

actions.name: searchbytext
actions.description: Search for places (geocoding) with freeform text (address, name, city, or region). The search can be narrowed by specifying categories, or nearby coordinates.

text.title: text
text.description: Search text used to suggest places, such as addresses, cities, places of interest, or regions.

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: Comma-separated coordinates (latitude,longitude) of the location used to bias the search to prefer results closer to a particular position.

categories.title: categories
categories.description: A comma-separated list of categories used to filter places returned. If multiple categories are provided, the results will match _any_ of the listed categories.

actions.name: calculatedistance
actions.description: Calculate the travel distance between an origin and destination location.

origin.title: origin
origin.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the origin (comma-separated).

destination.title: destination
destination.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the destination (comma-separated).

travel_mode.title: travel_mode
travel_mode.description: The mode of transport used when calculating a route. Either `Car`, `Walking`, or `Bicycle`.

distance_unit.title: distance_unit
distance_unit.description: The units used when returning the distance, either `Kilometers` or `Miles`

actions.name: getcurrentcoordinates
actions.description: Returns the latitude and longitude for the current device.

tools.name: RealEstateManagement
tools.description: Tools for helping finding new homes

actions.name: searchrealestatelistings
actions.description: Search for real estate listings in local neighborhood.

city.title: city
city.description: The location to search for listings

bedrooms.title: bedrooms
bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms for listing

bathrooms.title: bathrooms
bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms for listing

actions.name: searchneighborhooddata
actions.description: Search for neighborhood data.

zipcode.title: zipcode
zipcode.description: ZIP code for which to retrieve data.

median_home_value.title: median_home_value
median_home_value.description: The median home value in the neighborhood.

crime_rate.title: crime_rate
crime_rate.description: The crime rate in the neighborhood.

description.title: description
description.description: Description of neighborhood which includes information about nearby amenities (e.g., parks, restaurants, shopping centers).

actions.name: calculatepropertyvalue
actions.description: Calculate property value based on neighborhood and property attributes.

median_home_value.title: median_home_value
median_home_value.description: The median home value in the neighborhood.

crime_rate.title: crime_rate
crime_rate.description: The crime rate in the neighborhood.

bedrooms.title: bedrooms
bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms for listing

bathrooms.title: bathrooms
bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms for listing

square_feet.title: square_feet
square_feet.description: The square footage of the property.

estimated_value.title: estimated_value
estimated_value.description: The estimated market value of the property based on the provided information and neighborhood data.

actions.name: calculateclosingcost
actions.description: Calculate closing cost based on property value, location, and type of mortgage loan.

property_value.title: property_value
property_value.description: The estimated market value of the property.

state.title: state
state.description: The state where the property is located.

loan_type.title: loan_type
loan_type.description: Type of loan the applicant is applying for (e.g., Fixed, Adjustable, Interest-Only)

closing_cost.title: closing_cost
closing_cost.description: The estimated closing cost based on the property value and location.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that obtains the user's credit score from a reliable source and generates their credit report.

tools.name: Banking
tools.description: This tool let's you manage your bank account.

actions.name: listaccounts
actions.description: The list of all accounts of the user that is logged.

actions.name: checkbalance
actions.description: Check the account balance. Works for all types of account Checking, Savings, Credit.

actions.name: listtransactions
actions.description: Lists the most recent transactions in an account.

num_transaction.title: num_transaction
num_transaction.description: The maximum number of transactions to visualize. If not provided default at 10.

actions.name: requestcreditcard
actions.description: Request a new credit card of a specific type.

card_type.title: card_type
card_type.description: The type of credit card to request.

actions.name: replacecreditcard
actions.description: Replace a lost credit card.

actions.name: transfer
actions.description: Perform a transfer of funds between accounts.

recipient_routing_number.title: recipient_routing_number
recipient_routing_number.description: Routing Number of the recipient account.

currency.title: currency
currency.description: The currency of the transfer. If it is not provided it will default to the account currency.

original_account_balance.description: The original balance of the account.

target_account_balance.description: The target balance of the account.

receipt_number.description: The receipt number of the transfer.

tools.name: CreditReport
tools.description: Tools for obtaining user credit reports

actions.name: searchcreditreports
actions.description: Search for user's credit reports.

user_id.title: user_id
user_id.description: The unique identifier for the user

actions.name: describescoreranges
actions.description: Explain credit score.

score_range.title: score_range
score_range.description: The range in which the credit score falls

score_description.title: score_description
score_description.description: Description of what the score range means

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that obtains information about user's income.

actions.name: calculate
actions.description: Resolving a mathematical expression (written in Python syntax)"

actions.name: convert

result.description: The result of conversion from input to output units.

actions.name: generaterandomnumber
actions.description: Generate a random integer in some range (default: 0 - 1000)

result.description: A random number in the specified range.

tools.name: HRPayrollBenefits
tools.description: Look up payroll and benefits information.

actions.name: payroll
actions.description: Get payroll information for a particular employee.

employee_id.title: employee_id
employee_id.description: The ID of the employee for retrieving payroll information

period_start.title: period_start
period_start.description: Return pay statements for pay periods starting on or after this date.

period_end.title: period_end
period_end.description: Return pay statements for pay periods ending on or before this date.

actions.name: beneficiaries
actions.description: Returns a list of beneficiaries for a particular employee.

employee_id.title: employee_id
employee_id.description: The ID of the employee to retrieve benefits for

actions.name: updatebeneficiary
actions.description: Updates details about a particular beneficiary.

beneficiary_id.title: beneficiary_id
beneficiary_id.description: The ID of the beneficiary to update

relationship.title: relationship
relationship.description: The relationship of the beneficiary (one of `spouse`, `child`, `parent`, `domestic partner`, `relative`, `friend` or `other`

phone_number.title: phone_number
phone_number.description: The contact phone number of the beneficiary.

allocation.title: allocation
allocation.description: Percentage allocation, between 1 and 100 (set to 0 to remove the beneficiary).

actions.name: benefits
actions.description: Return a list of benefits associated with a particular employee.

employee_id.title: employee_id
employee_id.description: The ID of the employee to retrieve benefits for

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps users calculate their potential monthly mortgage payments. You will need to take into account the home price, down payment, loan term, and interest rate.

actions.name: calculate
actions.description: Resolving a mathematical expression (written in Python syntax)"

actions.name: convert

result.description: The result of conversion from input to output units.

actions.name: generaterandomnumber
actions.description: Generate a random integer in some range (default: 0 - 1000)

result.description: A random number in the specified range.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps users estimate the closing costs for a home purchase. This includes taking into account the home price and location.

actions.name: calculate
actions.description: Resolving a mathematical expression (written in Python syntax)"

actions.name: convert

result.description: The result of conversion from input to output units.

actions.name: generaterandomnumber
actions.description: Generate a random integer in some range (default: 0 - 1000)

result.description: A random number in the specified range.
